ygData.subject: Re: Animal, Troll, Gnome, Barbarian sketches?
ygData.msgSnippet: tried a few days before the last patch, got cookies from at least 2 different sketches. will probably try again next time i play to see if the patch fixed
ygData.messageBody:
tried a few days before the last patch, got cookies from at least 2
different sketches. will probably try again next time i play to see if the
patch fixed it...

Xillitil/Povar

><<What do these make and how do you make them?>>
>
>Not sure, but i've heard that these are quite broken: they are intended to
>be
>cookie cutter shapes, but somehow you actually end up with the cookies?!?
>
>Can someone confirm?
>
>While we're at it, has the "biggest secret in pottery" ever been figured
>out;
>Diety?
>
>- Nikolita, Floating Merchant
>
